name: Sample and Hold
description:
This algorithm is a simple sample/track and hold utility. A common gate/trigger input controls the sampling/tracking of a number of signal channels.

There are two modes of operation:

- 'Sample and hold' - the output is a sample of the input, taken when the gate/trigger input goes high.

- 'Track and hold' - the output follows the input while the gate is high, and freezes when the gate goes low.

specifications.name: Channels
specifications.description: The number of bus channels to process (1-8).

parameters.name: Output_mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: Chooses between 'Sample and hold' and 'Track and hold'.

input_ports.name: Gate_input
input_ports.description: The gate/trigger input bus controlling sampling/tracking.

input_ports.name: Signal_input
input_ports.description: The signal input bus to sample or track (per-channel).

output_ports.name: Output_bus
output_ports.description: The output bus holding the sampled/tracked signal (per-channel).
